g.text: registerProduct(uniqueInternalCode, barcode, shortDescription, extendedDescription, priceWithoutTaxes, status, weight, volume, priceWithTaxes, productCategory, technicalDescription, brandName, reference, productionCode, photos)

newProduct = create(uniqueInternalCode, barcode, shortDescription, extendedDescription, priceWithoutTaxes, status, weight, volume, priceWithTaxes, productCategory, technicalDescription, brandName, reference, productionCode, photos)
informs of operation success or fail
